scripts.start: yarn sync && yarn seed && yarn build && node dist/server
scripts.build: npm -s run clean && npm -s run generate && tsc
scripts.generate: npm -s run generate:prisma && npm -s run generate:nexus
scripts.hard-migrate: source .env; postgresurl=$(echo $POSTGRES_URL); dbname=${postgresurl##*/}; dropdb $dbname; rm -rf prisma/migrations && prisma migrate save --experimental --name init -c && yarn sync && yarn dev-seed
